products.description:
The Blue Whale Longport hot tub has 120 hydrotherapy jets arranged differently in each of the hot
tub seats, allowing each user to experience an entirely different massage sensation. As well as jets
for the back, legs and thighs, and two more foot massage jets at the end of each of the long
comfortable lounger seats. Air valves placed around the rim of the spa enable each user to have
control over the strength of each seat’s individual performance. 27 colour changing LED lights
further enhance the relaxation possibilities of this powerful 32Amp hot tub.

Features:

  • Seating for 5 with 120 hydrotherapy jets
  • 4 x exclusive Storm Force 9 Jet pumps
  • User-friendly Balboa control systems
  • 2 x LED waterfalls and 8 illuminated fountains.
  • 27 LED lights around the waterline and in the LED backlit waterfall and fountains
  • 3 hydro massage seats and 2 comfortable lounger seats.
  • 3 kW Balboa heater
  • Three air valves to adjust the massage strength
  • Quad insulation to ensure energy efficiency; high density polyurethane foam sprayed on the tub shell, silver backed foam inside the side panels and also inside the sealed on ABS tub base, provide the best insulation
  • Bluetooth sound system
  • Cloudy white shell colour with grey side panels
  • Requires 230V/32Amp RCD protected power supply (not included)
  • Includes cover, cover lifter, step, chemical starter pack, spare filter and installation.

Please also note standard delivery does not include crane hire or the closing of any roads. If you
have any queries of what is included in the standard delivery please call Blue Whale Spas customer
helpline: 0115 954 8888

N.B. The hot tub is not fitted with a cable or plug. Your electrician will need to leave a tail of 3 core 6mm armoured cable, connected to an isolator switch long enough to go from the isolator switch, around the tub to where you require the control panel to be. The installation team will not fit a cable into an isolator switch or consumer unit under any circumstances, please do not ask them to do this.
products.name: Blue Whale Spa Longport 120-Jet  5 Person Hot Tub - Delivered and Installed
products.summary: Includes: Spa Cover, Steps, Chemical Starter Pack, Spare Filter, Cover Lifter and Installation

Lifetime's 7-foot wide Outdoor Storage Sheds have several innovative features, including a skylight that runs the entire length of the roof to maximize natural lighting. They also include single-hinged double doors that open nearly 180 degrees and lock closed, a slip-resistant polyethylene floor, and low-maintenance, steel-reinforced construction.

84 square ft. (627.2 cubic ft.) - The Lifetime 7 ft. x 12 ft. Storage Shed features: (1) full-length skylight, (2) shatter-proof polycarbonate windows, (2) screened vents, (1) 30 in. x 10 in. shelf, (2) corner shelves. Floor and installation hardware included.

Features:

  • Attractive Appearance and Design
  • Customisable Shelving and Storage System
  • Dual-Wall High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Construction
  • Heavy-Duty Steel Trusses Provide Additional Roof Strength
  • High-Pitched Roof Allows for Quick Drainage of Rain and Snow
  • Lockable Steel-Reinforced Doors for Added Security
  • Low Maintenance Design
  • Max Wind Resistance 65 mph (104.6 kph) (15 PSF)
  • Slip-Resistant High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Floor Protects Against Oil, Solvents, and Stains
  • Sturdy Steel-Reinforced Construction
  • UV Protected to Prevent Weather Damage
  • Assembly: Secure-Fastened Assembly with High-Grade Metal Screws
  • Rough cut panels
  • Comes in 2 boxes
  • Cubic Feet: 627.2 ft. cu
  • Door Handle: High-Impact Handles with Metal Latch
  • Door Hinges: Full-Length Galvanized Steel Hinge Pins
  • Door Locking: Exterior Padlock Loop with Two (2) Deadbolts on Interior of Left Door
  • Door Structure: Steel-Reinforced Polyethylene
  • Eave Depth: 5.08 cm
  • Floor Structure: Slip-Resistant Dual-Wall Polyethylene
  • Footprint: 206.5 cm x 353.8 cm
  • Interior Headroom: 197.6 cm)
  • Materials of Construction: Powder-Coated Steel and High-Density Polyethylene
  • Max Roof Load: 40 psf

  • Roof Structure: Dual-Wall Polyethylene Panels
  • Roof Support Trusses: Four (4) Steel A-Frame Trusses
  • Screened Vents: Two (2) Screened Vents
  • Shelves: Two (2) Corner Shelves – 9 ½ in. radius + One (1) 30 in. W x 10 in. D Shelf
  • Square Feet: 7.8 m² (84 ft. sq)
  • Wall Structure: Steel-Reinforced Dual-Wall Polyethylene Panels
  • Windows: Two (2) H 31.5 x W 58 cm Polycarbonate Windows – Open Half-Way

N.B. Please note a cement foundation is required.

Please check full contents, footprint and measurements before installation. If you are enlisting the help of a third party to install this product, please ensure that all contents have been received in full and undamaged prior to arranging and paying for installation to take place. Accessories are not included.


Premium Installation Service:


Choose our Premium Installation Service with your chosen shed and enjoy the comfort of knowing that installation is taken care of by skilled and trained installers.

The installation office will contact you to guide you smoothly through the process and ensure you are happy with your purchase.

Prior to booking your install date (within 10 working days of delivery) the installers will telephone you to check the following:

1. That you have a suitable base for your shed. It needs to be firm, flat & level. We recommend concrete, slabs or a timber frame. Please note that your shed cannot be placed directly onto a base of grass, earth, sand etc as natural movement will effect the stability of the building.

2. That there is enough space to build your chosen shed and that access to the build area is clear of obstruction. A minimum of 24” (61cm) space is needed around the shed for the installers to work in.

3. That the contents have been checked in full and free from damage.

4. Please note that the installation company is unable to carry the shed through your home so if there is not adequate access, provision for this must be made. Please note that the installation service does not include the removal of packaging, but will leave it tidily for the member to dispose of.

The Sharp LC-70UI9362K Smart UHD provides a wide range of connection possibilities. Three HDMI 2.0 ports are able to receive 2160p@60Hz signal, a USB 3.0 port is perfect for connecting a fast hard disc drive (in addition to two USB 2.0 ports).

Ultra HD resolution
Four times the resolution of Full HD, clarity and expanded colour ranges ensure the best entertainment ever. Built-in advanced picture up-scaler technology improves every type of content to 4K resolution.

HDR – High Dynamic Range
HDR is expanding the contrast ratio and colour palette to offer a more realistic and natural image.

Aquos Net+
After connecting your Smart TV to you home network, you can enjoy movies and TV shows through the Netflix app or watch the latest internet videos on YouTube.

Wireless TV connection
Wirelessly connect your PC or Android device to your TV and immediately send media files to the big screen. It’s a great way to enjoy photos and videos together with friends and family.

Active Motion 800
Conventional liquid crystal displays (LCD) reproduce blurry movements. Active Motion effectively sharpens moving pictures by creating additional frames with its powerful GPU and using high-speed LCD panels.

The Samsung RS50N3913BC American Style Fridge is a great addition to your kitchen. With the handy window on the door, you can have quick access to your favourite items without opening the main door. This also results in less cold air escaping and so saving energy too. 

Get Ice on Tap
Help yourself to chilled filtered water or a jug of ice without having to open the fridge.

Smarter Use of Energy
The Digital Inverter Compressor cleverly alters the fridge's power and running speed to how much cooling is needed. So the temperature is constantly perfect, making it more efficient, as well as less noisy and longer-lasting.

Make Freeze a Breeze
No more worrying about your frozen favourites defrosting on the way home from the shops. Power Freeze rapidly lowers the temperature of the freezer once you've stocked up, quickly freezing everyone's must-have ice cream.

Alarmingly Good
Never worry about leaving the fridge door open again. An alarm is triggered when the door is left open for too long. So your food will stay as chilled as it should be, plus you'll save energy.
 
Power Down
How good would it be if your fridge didn't use so much energy whenever you're away? Simply switch to Vacation Mode. It powers down the fresh food section, so it uses less energy, while the freezer still keeps all your food frozen.

Rack ‘em up
A wine rack doesn't have to take over your fridge. This chrome one is not only an elegant way to store your favourite bottles; it also makes more space on your shelves for the food to enjoy with it.

Complete your home gym with the Nordic Track SE7i Elliptical. Included are a selection of 24 workout programms allowing you to reach your full work out potential while keeping variety and excitement in your routine. Fitted with 22 digital resistance levels you are able to create a workout perfectly fitted around your level of fitness. Made with a spacesaver design you can fold the Proform Track SE7i vertically meaning you can move and store your machine conveniently. Oversized cushion pedals and levelers ensure that you have a comfortable and efficient workout. 

The Proform Track SE7i comes with a 6 month iFit Coach subscription, which gives you access to personalised workouts, delicious nutrition plans, advanced weight loss programs, and much more. Plus, if you own iFit-enabled cardio equipment, your workouts will contain virtual coaching, studio-setting, on-demand videos, and destination workouts, right from your machine. 

Features:

  • Power adjustable incline
  • Intertia enhanced flywheel
  • Soft touch upper body grips
  • Commercial gauge solid steel construction
  • Oversized levelers
  • Verticle space saving design
  • 5" Backlit iFit display screen
  • SMR silent magnetic resistance
  • Oversized adjustable cushion pedals
  • Water bottle holder
  • Rear mounted transport wheels
  • iFit Bluetooth smart enabled
  • iPod compatible audio
  • Integrated tablet holder
  • 24 pre set workout apps
  • 22 Digital resistance
  • EKG grip pulse

Please email salesuk@iconeurope.com along with their proof of purchase to redeem iFit Subscription

The Kube 2 Water Softener is the best introductory water softener on the market that's great value, easy to install and economical to run. The non-electric design is powered by the natural flow of the water and provides beautiful soft water for you and your home so you can banish limescale forever. The Kube 2 is designed for larger homes with 3-4 bathrooms where a utility room is available. It can also be fitted outside the property with a frost cabinet. The only maintenance your softener requires is to replace the tablet salt.

With soft water you’ll save time cleaning and discover shiny taps, free-flowing showers and clear shower screens. Soft water running through your home will also increase the life of your appliances such as your dishwasher, washing machine and boiler and you’ll save money too. You can ditch the spray-on limescale removers, use less detergents, bath foams and toiletries. 
 
Operating using only the power of moving water, this Kube 2 Water Softener offers reliability and easier installation. It requires no power cables or electronic components, which means it won't corrode over time and you'll have no electricity costs and includes a 22mm fitting kit making installation easy. 

Features:

  • Suitable for homes with up to 4 bathrooms
  • Can be installed in a utility room or outside your home in a frost cabinet - not suitable for small kitchen cabinets
  • WRAS approved
  • High Performance and Reliable: Non-electric patented valve, counter-current regeneration technology and high capacity fine mesh resin engineered to deliver high flow rates of soft water typically used by today’s demanding households
  • Powerful: The ion exchange process used is the most effective method to totally remove calcium and magnesium from hard water
  • Compact and Convenient: Designed as a modern, contemporary
    household appliance with a transparent blue viewing window at the front of the softener allows you to check
    the salt levels, making it easier to see when your salt needs refilling. It also has the added benefit of running on either block salt and tablet salt
  • Easy to Install: Does not require connection to mains power supply making installation quicker and easier
  • Energy Efficient: Accurately meters the water to determine the exact moment when the tank needs to regenerate, thus great efficiency with low water and salt consumption. Non-electric valve means greater sustainability, no electricity costs, better for the environment and saves you money. The Kube 2’s larger resin tank means less regenerations
  • Quiet Drive: Precision engineered valve to operate quietly for minimum disturbance and noise level
  • Max. Hardness: 850 mg/L
  • Salt Usage Per Regeneration: 0.59kg
  • Water Usage Per Regeneration: 36L
  • Regeneration Time: 16 minutes
  • Service Flow Rate: 36L per minute at 1 bar pressure, 45L per minute at 2 bar pressure
  • Connection: 3/4" BSP Male
  • Includes: 22mm WRAS approved drain and hose kit suitable for 32mm and 40mm waste pipe
  • Operating Temperature: Min. 2°C to 23°C max
  • Min. Pressure: 1.5 bar
  • Max. Pressure: 8 Bar
  • Recommended PRV fitted if above 6 bar
  • Weight: 30kg
  • Dimensions: H 57.6 x W 34.3 x D 54.7 cm
  • Warranty: 2 years manufacturer's warranty
 
Installation Options:
 
To ensure peace-of-mind, compliance with water regulations and warrantied workmanship. Kinetico offer an installation service (£250 + VAT) for your new Kube 1 Water Softener.
 
Installation takes up to 4 hours and requires access to your mains stop cock and drainage. Please visit the Kinetico website for more details.
products.englishName: Kinetico Kube 2 Whole House Water Softener
products.name: Kinetico Kube 2 Non-Electric Water Softener - For Households with up to 4 Bathrooms
products.summary: Includes a 22mm WRAS approved installation kit

products.description:
The Lenovo Yoga 720 offers ultimate versatility, with a number of different ways to enjoy your laptop. No longer are you stuck in the office or bound to a power socket, as the Yoga 720 boasts a battery life of up to 10.5 hours. Stream in tent mode, flip 360º for tablet mode or switch to laptop mode when you need to get down to business.

 

Speedy Process

Intel’s 8th-generation i5 processor is designed to make your laptop faster and more efficient. It’s purposely built to support lightning-quick data transfer. Your laptop’s overall productivity will show improvement for flawless multi-tasking.

 

M.2 Solid State Drive

Solid State Drives (SSD) gives you the capacity to store your documents and media, while ensuring quicker and reliable access to your files and programs. SSDs are far faster than regular hard drives; in addition to this, M.2 has been created to replace existing technology and to exploit the full capability of high-speed PCI Express storage. Ingeniously, SSDs don't use moving parts to work, which makes them far more dependable and also quieter.

 

Packed with Features

Featuring multiple ports, you can be sure there is space for all your external devices to be attached and then there’s the handy 720P camera that’s ready to take pictures on the fly or enable video conferencing for those times you can’t get into the office.

 

Key Additional Features 

  • Model: Lenovo Yoga 720-13IKBR
  • Backlit Keyboard
  • Dolby Audio Premium Sound 
  • Voice Recognition - Cortana
  • 720p HD Front Facing Camera
  • 10-point Multi-touch

products.description:
The Sonorous ST160 enables you to discreetly store all of your audio/video equipment right at the heart of your living space. The Sonorous 160cm cabinet is a stylish and functional addition to any home.

Hidden castors make it easier to move to your required position and reach connecting wires without scratching wooden floors. The Acoustic Fabric finished door allows full control of AV equipment inside the cabinet without having to open doors. It will also enable you to conceal speakers and soundbars inside the cabinet without affecting sound quality. Push to open door system with high quality hinges, multiple discreet cable management points and adjustable internal shelf heights to accommodate varying sizes of devices. This cabinet comes ready assembled for ease and consistent quality of construction.

Exceptional Quality and Finish

This furniture is designed and manufactured to ensure highest attention to detail and quality. The latest technological advancements are implemented to ensure the quality of your unit.

  • White: Gloss White Wood with Toughened White Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Black: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Walnut; Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Textured Walnut Veneer Across the Opening Flap
  • Black With Acoustic Fabric Doors: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Black Acoustic (Speaker) Fabric Across the Opening Flap

Contemporary yet Practical

AV equipment needs to “breathe” whilst in use, that’s why the ST160 cabinets are open at the rear to ensure sufficient ventilation and air flow, and easy access to all connecting wires. The Acoustic Fabric finish on the opening flap ensures even the most sophisticated of AV set up’s will be cooled sufficiently for optimal performance. In order to ensure that your cabinet looks its best at all times, the glass shelves come with a protective coating, which reduces stains and fingerprints.

Features:

  • Maximum screen size: 70” screen
  • Maximum Top Shelf Load: 50 kg
  • Maximum Stand Load: 70 kg
products.name: Sonorous ST160 TV Cabinet for TVs up to 70" in 4 Colours
products.summary:
- Suitable for TVs up to 70”

- Adjustable internal shelf heights

- Discreet cable management

products.description:
This Vitavia Vermont 6200 Greenhouse Package will meet the needs of all gardeners, from beginners to those with more gardening expertise. Featuring a classic apex design for strength and reliability, the greenhouse is constructed from an anodised silver coloured aluminium frame with toughened glass panels. The sliding door can be positioned to the left or right hand side of the greenhouse to suit your preference.

The greenhouse offers a large 6.2 metre squared growing area and comes complete with a 1-tier staging table for additional work surface and which also doubles up as a handy storage area. Toughened Glass is much stronger than Horticultural glass and won't crack. If it does break it disintegrates into hundreds of small pieces that are unlikely to cause injury, unlike Horticultural Glass which breaks into shards. The roof vent will provide ventilation for your plants, and the auto roof vent opener will automatically open the roof vent when the interior temperature of the greenhouse gets too hot. 

Specifications:

  • Anodised silver coloured aluminium frame
  • Toughened glass
  • Easy slide sliding door which can be positioned either side of the greenhouse
  • Auto vent will automatically open when the interior temperature gets too hot
  • Roof vent for ventilation
  • Roof bracing for addtional strength
  • Integral gutters
  • 1 tier staging table for additional work surface/storage area
  • Steel perimeter base
  • Approved by the TUV Standards Authority
  • Build Time: 2 people approx. 2 days
  • Growing Area: 6.2 m/sq
  • Sliding Door Width: 0.6 m
  • Max. Ridge Height: 1.97 m
  • Eaves Height: 1.24 m
  • Base Included: Yes
  • Assembled Dimensions: H 1.97 x W 2 x L 3.2 m
  • Base Dimensions: W 2 x L 3.2 m

 

N.B Ground must be firm and level prior to assembly. For best results a concrete/slab base should be used.

Please note that the down piping kit is not included.

This product does not come with installation and will be delivered only.

Premium Services - Installation Service:

Choose a premium installation service with your chosen greenhouse and enjoy the ease of knowing installation is taken care of. Let teams of skilled and trained installers take care of your installation and choose a premium installation service with your greenhouse for minimal fuss and swift assembly.
products.name: Vitavia Vermont 6200 6ft 2" x 10ft 4" (2 x 3.2 m) Greenhouse Package
products.summary: Includes single sliding door, toughened glass, steel perimeter base, 1 x 1 tier staging table, automatic roof vent opener and downpipe kit

products.description:
The Sealy Prestige 1400 Pocket Latex Box Top mattress encompasses all of the support you would expect from a Sealy Posturepedic, with the luxury sleeping experience of a pocket sprung bed.

It features 1400 motion and weight responsive springs, which are individually fabric encased to provide excellent support and help eliminate noise. The individual pocket springs mould to the contours of the body, aligning the spine, whilst the insert of Latex gives greater ‘push back’ for exceptional comfort and pressure relief. Latex also boasts inherent breathability, keeping you cool throughout the night. The 7 zone foam provides relief to your pressure points and supports your body where you need it most.

The luxurious micro quilted box top construction offers sumptuous comfort and features Sealy SMART fibres. Sealy Smart Fibres are endorsed by Allergy UK and work collaboratively with Adaptive to create a cool, fresh and hypoallergenic sleeping environment. Tencel is made from eucalyptus and has excellent moisture absorption properties, creating a positive environment that does not give mould a chance to grow. Purotex fibres work alongside Tencel by releasing microcapsules into the fabric of the mattress, keeping the sleep surface clean and extending the mattresses lifespan.

The 26cm divan base is designed for convenience, offering a shallower foundation for your deeper Sealy mattress. Sealy divan bases are beautifully handcrafted in a simple, on-trend style that will suit any bedroom decor. The single size divan has 2 storage drawers (side by side), whilst the double, king and super king options have 4 storage drawers.

Features

  • Micro quilted sleep surface for added comfort
  • Features 1400 motion & weight responsive pocket springs to provide greater durability & support
  • Latex provides even pressure distribution, responding to your body’s contours to provide excellent comfort & support
  • 7 zone foam provides relief to your pressure points
  • Purotex fibres are endorsed by Allergy UK & release friendly bacteria into the fabric of the mattress acting as a self-cleaner- great for allergy sufferers
  • Made from eucalyptus, Tencel fibres are inherently breathable, avoiding irritation to the skin whilst you are sleeping & preventing your body from overheating
  • Adaptive releases & transports moisture- the perfect solution for a cool, dry sleep
  • Handmade in the UK
  • Mattress Firmness: Medium/Firm
  • Mattress Depth: 30 cm

Please email webenquiry@sealy.co.uk to receive a sample swatch of the divan fabric. Please include your name, address, phone number and the item description that corresponds with your selection.

Sealy divan bases are beautifully handcrafted in a simple, on-trend style that will suit any bedroom decor. The single size divan has 2 storage drawers (side by side), whilst the double, king and super king options have 4 storage drawers.

Features

  • Micro quilted sleep surface for added comfort
  • Features 1400 motion & weight responsive pocket springs to provide greater durability & support
  • Latex provides even pressure distribution, responding to your body’s contours to provide excellent comfort & support
  • 7 zone foam provides relief to your pressure points
  • Purotex fibres are endorsed by Allergy UK & release friendly bacteria into the fabric of the mattress acting as a self-cleaner- great for allergy sufferers
  • Made from eucalyptus, Tencel fibres are inherently breathable, avoiding irritation to the skin whilst you are sleeping & preventing your body from overheating
  • Adaptive releases & transports moisture- the perfect solution for a cool, dry sleep
  • Handmade in the UK
  • Mattress Firmness: Medium/Firm
  • Mattress Depth: 30 cm

Please email webenquiry@sealy.co.uk to receive a sample swatch of the divan fabric. Please include your name, address, phone number and the item description that corresponds with your selection.

This Vitavia Vermont 5000 is a great entry level greenhouse for gardeners of all experience. It comes as a complete package with its steel perimeter base, toughened glass, 1-tier staging table for inside the greenhouse and a roof vent with automatic opener when temperature rises.

 

  • 6ft x 8ft size gives you 5sq metres of growing floor space, plus space on the one-tier staging table

  • Reversible door position: you can hang the sliding doors to open either left or right - ideal for access if it's next to a wall
  • Superb strength due to the anodised aluminium structure and roof braces
  • Complete with quality steel perimeter base
  • Quality through and through: the Vermont 5000 has been approved by the TUV standards authority
  • Stays looking pristine for its lifespan as the aluminium is anodised
  • Toughened glass tempered for your safety and peace of mind
  • Automatic roof vent opener: it opens the roof vent when the temperature rises so what you grow doesn't dry out and die

products.description:
The Haier HW100-BD14756 10kg White Washing Machine helps long laundry days a thing of the past. With a huge 10kg capacity and an A+++ -50% energy rating you can wash mounds of clothes, sheets or dirty sports kits in one load as well as doing your part for the environment. With some great features include Smart Dosing, Smart Dual Spray and Auto Weight you will be pleasantly surprised with the Haier HW100-BD14756.

ABT
The detergent drawer is anti-bacterial; which works by preventing bacteria from forming in the gasket drawer, meaning you will have better cleaning results and safer washing conditions for your laundry.

Smart Dosing
Provides intelligent dosage for best results based on the load and dirtiness of laundry. It allows to wash more eco-friendly due to a saving of detergent and softener equivalent to up to 33 wash cycles per year

Smart Dual Spray
Removes all fibres usually blocked in the gasket after usage. The result, fluff-free washing

Auto Weight
Just before the cycle starts, the machine weighs your garments and calculates the wash cycle time and the amount of water required. With just one touch it's never been easier to manage your washing machine!

Direct Motion Motor
Fewer moving parts for an increased reliability. Runs at just 67dB, making it one of the quietest machines on the UK market. Perfect for open-plan, uninterrupted living.

Adjustable spin speed
With an easily adjustable spin speed the HW100-BD14756 allows you to take care of your more delicate items.


Features:

  • Super Quiet at only 67 dB on a spinning cycle
  • Smart Dosing
  • Direct Motion Motor
  • Motor Overheating Protection
  • Auto Door Lock
  • Efficient A+++ -50% Rating
  • Adjustable Thermostat

16 Programmes:

  • Cotton
  • Synthetics
  • Mix
  • Delicate
  • Wool
  • Baby Care
  • Daily Wash
  • Hand Wash
  • Express 15 min
  • Jeans
  • Wash 15°C
  • Duvet
  • Sport
  • Spin

products.description:
4K UHD HDR

Awarded the 4K HDR Ultra HD logo, all of Toshiba’s 4K HDR TVs have been proven to deliver and faithfully display 4K HDR content in all its glory.

 

TRU Picture Engine

Imagination realised. Discover the true power of exceptional image clarity, enhanced contrast and smoother, more natural onscreen motion. With TRU Picture Engine, you can enjoy life-like picture quality for any on-screen content, including Full HD and HD ready video and live TV.

 

Dolby Vision HDR

Immerse yourself in the onscreen action with one of our Toshiba Dolby Vision compatible TVs. The preferred HDR video format of movie makers around the world, Dolby Vision uses dynamic metadata to read and calculate exactly the right brightness level for every TV frame.

 

Wide Colour Gamut

Experience more power and emotion when you watch TV. With Toshiba’s  wide colour gamut models, every scene is displayed with unprecedented, life-like-colour vibrancy. Capable of reflecting up to 1024 shades per colour, they capture hues that are usually merged together and lost on the screen.

 

Enhanced premium audio with Sound by Onkyo and front facing speakers

Working in collaboration with Onkyo, a global force in audio, Toshiba is bringing TV to life with enhanced sound quality. Featuring built-in Onkyo speakers and speaker boxes, the TVs ensure clearer audio for both on-screen dialogue and music. Tuned by Onkyo engineers, the speakers are designed to ensure life-like, precise sound that can be heard equally well from any seat in the room.

 

TRU Resolution

Automatically up-scales non 4K content so you can experience your favourite movies and TV shows in the highest resolution.

 

TRU Flow

Predicts the frame in between the frames to create smoother viewing in fast-paced scenes. Perfect for sport and movies.

 

TRU Micro Dimming

Enhances the contrast of an image by optimising the darker and brighter regions to create a more realistic image.

 

Netflix in 4K

Discover the Netflix button on your remote control to jump from one adventure to another.

 

Freeview HD

With Freeview HD you can enjoy your favourite shows on up to 15 HD channels, including BBC One HD, BBC Two HD, ITV HD and Channel 4 HD, as well as more than 70 channels in standard definition – all for free.

 

Works with Alexa

Talk to Alexa via an Echo or Echo Dot and control your Toshiba Smart TV with nothing but the sound of your voice.

products.description:
The Sealy Prestige 1400 Pocket Latex Box Top mattress encompasses all of the support you would expect from a Sealy Posturepedic, with the luxury sleeping experience of a pocket sprung bed.

It features 1400 motion and weight responsive springs, which are individually fabric encased to provide excellent support and help eliminate noise. The individual pocket springs mould to the contours of the body, aligning the spine, whilst the insert of Latex gives greater ‘push back’ for exceptional comfort and pressure relief. Latex also boasts inherent breathability, keeping you cool throughout the night. The 7 zone foam provides relief to your pressure points and supports your body where you need it most.

The luxurious micro quilted box top construction offers sumptuous comfort and features Sealy SMART fibres. Sealy Smart Fibres are endorsed by Allergy UK and work collaboratively with Adaptive to create a cool, fresh and hypoallergenic sleeping environment. Tencel is made from eucalyptus and has excellent moisture absorption properties, creating a positive environment that does not give mould a chance to grow. Purotex fibres work alongside Tencel by releasing microcapsules into the fabric of the mattress, keeping the sleep surface clean and extending the mattresses lifespan.

Features

  • Micro quilted sleep surface for added comfort
  • Features 1400 motion & weight responsive pocket springs to provide greater durability and support
  • Latex provides even pressure distribution, responding to your body’s contours to provide excellent comfort & support
  • 7 zone foam provides relief to your pressure points
  • Purotex fibres are endorsed by Allergy UK & release friendly bacteria into the fabric of the mattress acting as a self-cleaner- great for allergy sufferers
  • Made from eucalyptus, Tencel fibres are inherently breathable, avoiding irritation to the skin whilst you are sleeping & preventing your body from overheating
  • Adaptive releases & transports moisture- the perfect solution for a cool, dry sleep
  • Handmade in the UK
  • Mattress Firmness: Medium/Firm
  • Mattress Depth: 38 cm

Please Note: Listed spring counts are based on a king size mattress. The number of springs will alter based on a pro-rata basis dependent on mattress size.

Optiflame is the world’s most popular electric flame effect, and can be found in a wide selection of Dimplex fires. products.description:
The Ring Alarms provide an affordable solution to whole-home security, with no long-term commitments. Easily set up your Alarm in minutes, without tools or professional installation, and connect up to Alexa devices to arm, disarm and check the status of your Ring Alarm security with your voice. 

This 7-piece kit includes everything you need to begin your whole-home security with Ring.

7pc Kit Includes:

1 x Base Station

The BaseStation is the brains behind it all - keeping your Ring Alarm online and connected to your devices. If your power or WiFi goes out, you'll still have 24 hours protection with battery backup and the optional Cellular backups. Mains powered, with a rechargeable 24-hour backup battery included, the system connects to your internet through WiFi or Ethernet. 

2 x Contact Sensor

Mount the contact sensors to doors or window frames to know when they're open. Powered by a 3V Lithium Battery with 3-year battery life.

2 x Motion Detector

Mount to room corners or flat walls to detect motion inside your home. The system is smart enough and designed to ignore pets weighing under 50lb when mounted at seven ft. Powered by a 3V Lithium Battery with a 3-year battery life.

1 x Keypad

The Keypad allows you to control your home from inside, with battery-powered simplicity. Mount it to any flat wall, or keep it as a portable keypad. You can add more for easier access. Control security modes - "Disarmed" deactivates your sensors and allows you to move freely within the house. Set the mode to "Away" to activate all sensors to protect your home while you're at work or on holiday. Or, activate select senors with the "Home" setting, giving you the flexibility of protecting the downstairs, while you work upstairs.

1 x Range Extender

Extend the signal from your Ring Base Station to other Ring alarm components, ensuring your security coverage is strong and clear. The Range Extender plugs into a standard wall socket, with a rechargeable 24-hour backup battery included and utilises Z-Wave technology, providing coverage of 250-foot range to the Base Station. 

Features of the Ring Alarm Security Kit

Protect your home, your way

Welcome to your safer, smarter home. Ring Alarm easily expands to fit your needs, on your terms. Simply plug in the Ring Base Station, connect your components, get set up with your account in the Ring app and control your Ring Alarm with the keypad or from the Ring app. Everything you need to get started is in the box. 

Complete Control with the Ring app

Get notifications when someone enters a room, opens a window or sets off the siren. Change your Alarm models with a simple tap. On your way out but forgot to set your alarm? Don't worry - with Ring, you can arm or disarm your Alarm no matter where you are. 

Your Ring Alarm detects an issue

You’ll receive notifications when a contact sensor, motion detector or any part of your Alarm system is triggered.

See what’s happening

Check your Ring app to verify whether it’s simply a family member coming home early or something more serious.

Do it all yourself

Everything you need to get started is in the box and works in any home. Never worry about service appointments or long-term commitments. It's that simple.

Add an extra layer of security with the optional Ring Protect Plus plan

With an optional Ring Protect Plus plan:

  • Stay connected with cellular backup in case your internet goes down.
  • Opt into Assisted Monitoring for automated calls to three emergency contacts during an Alarm event. So someone you trust can respond, even if you're uncontactable.

Find out more 

Pack Includes

  • 1 x Base Station
  • 2 x Contact Sensor
  • 2 x Motion Detector
  • 1 x Keypad
  • 1 x Range Extender

products.name: Ring Alarm 7 Piece Starter Kit with x2 Contact Sensors and x 2 Motion Sensors
products.summary: Includes 1x Base Station, 2x Contact Sensors, 2x Motion Detector, 1x Keypad, 1x Range Extender

products.description:
The Perfectcare aqua pro comes with a ultra-light iron and extra large 2.5L water tank. Ideal for long ironing sessions and perfect vertical steaming.

Extra-large water tank for longer continuous use
The water tank has an extra-large 2.5L  capacity, so you get the convenience of up to 3 hours of continuous use with no need to top up the tank. It's also transparent, so you can get a 360° view of the tank to easily see how much water you have left to continue creating steam efficiently. When you do need to refill, your steam generator iron has a large filling hole that allows you to easily fill the water tank under the tap, or alternatively with a jug or bottle at any time during ironing

Easy and efficient descaling system
Regular descaling protects your iron and ensures you'll continue to get the very best steam performance. The exclusively designed and ideally positioned Easy De-Calc Plus function provides the ideal way to get rid of lime scale and extend the lifespan of your steam generator iron. The iron will remind you with both light and sound when it's time to clean and descale.

Save energy with ECO mode
ECO mode allows you to save energy without compromising your ironing results. The ECO mode uses a reduced amount of steam, but still a sufficient amount to iron all your garments.

Go from ironing jeans to silk; no need to change temperature setting
With OptimalTEMP technology you'll no longer have to waste time changing temperature settings, waiting for the temperature to adjust or pre-sorting clothes. Iron all fabrics, from jeans to silk, with no burning guaranteed thanks to the perfect combination of temperature and continuous powerful steam.

Safe and secure carry lock
Your steam generator iron includes a safe carry lock, which securely fastens your iron to its base without the risk of it slipping or someone touching the hot soleplate. 

Safe to leave the hot soleplate on the ironing board
Innovative OptimalTEMP technology guarantees no burning on any ironable fabric. As well as the reassurance this provides whilst ironing, it also means you can leave the hot iron soleplate directly on your cotton ironing board without causing any damage. 

Automatic switch-off for safety and energy saving
The safety auto-off function automatically switches off your steam generator iron if it has not been used for a few minutes. This saves energy and gives you peace of mind about safety.

The steam generator is fitted with silencing steam filters to minimise the noise of the steam and a sound-absorbing platform to reduce the noise of vibration in the base

Philips' best gliding and most scratch-resistant soleplate
The T-ionic Glide is Philips' most premium soleplate, promising superior gliding for faster, effortless ironing. It has a stainless steel base which is harder and more durable than aluminium, with an integrated titanium oxide layer for advanced scratch resistance. Plus the carefully designed shape and vents provide even better steam distribution for faster crease removal.

Powerful steam for ultimate crease removal
An ultra-fast ironing experience can be yours with revolutionary technology. The powerful and continuous steam tackles even tough creases, and thicker fabrics are smoothed out with ease and speed. Plus there's an extra steam boost if needed, perfect for vertical steaming or stubborn creases.

Lightweight and comfortable to handle
Your steam generator iron is amazingly light and comfortable to handle.

Features

  • Super-powerful ironing with ultra-light iron
  • Max 6.7 bar pressure
  • Up to 450g steam boost
  • 2.5L water tank capacity
products.name: Philips PerfectCare Aqua Pro Steam Generator Iron GC9410/60
products.summary:
Super-powerful ironing with Ultra-light iron
Extra-large water tank for longer continuous use
Powerful steam for ultimate crease removal
Automatic switch-off for safety and energy saving

examples.description:
The Blue Whale Longport hot tub has 120 hydrotherapy jets arranged differently in each of the hot
tub seats, allowing each user to experience an entirely different massage sensation. As well as jets
for the back, legs and thighs, and two more foot massage jets at the end of each of the long
comfortable lounger seats. Air valves placed around the rim of the spa enable each user to have
control over the strength of each seat’s individual performance. 27 colour changing LED lights
further enhance the relaxation possibilities of this powerful 32Amp hot tub.

Features:

  • Seating for 5 with 120 hydrotherapy jets
  • 4 x exclusive Storm Force 9 Jet pumps
  • User-friendly Balboa control systems
  • 2 x LED waterfalls and 8 illuminated fountains.
  • 27 LED lights around the waterline and in the LED backlit waterfall and fountains
  • 3 hydro massage seats and 2 comfortable lounger seats.
  • 3 kW Balboa heater
  • Three air valves to adjust the massage strength
  • Quad insulation to ensure energy efficiency; high density polyurethane foam sprayed on the tub shell, silver backed foam inside the side panels and also inside the sealed on ABS tub base, provide the best insulation
  • Bluetooth sound system
  • Cloudy white shell colour with grey side panels
  • Requires 230V/32Amp RCD protected power supply (not included)
  • Includes cover, cover lifter, step, chemical starter pack, spare filter and installation.

Please also note standard delivery does not include crane hire or the closing of any roads. If you
have any queries of what is included in the standard delivery please call Blue Whale Spas customer
helpline: 0115 954 8888

N.B. The hot tub is not fitted with a cable or plug. Your electrician will need to leave a tail of 3 core 6mm armoured cable, connected to an isolator switch long enough to go from the isolator switch, around the tub to where you require the control panel to be. The installation team will not fit a cable into an isolator switch or consumer unit under any circumstances, please do not ask them to do this.
examples.name: Blue Whale Spa Longport 120-Jet  5 Person Hot Tub - Delivered and Installed
examples.summary: Includes: Spa Cover, Steps, Chemical Starter Pack, Spare Filter, Cover Lifter and Installation

Lifetime's 7-foot wide Outdoor Storage Sheds have several innovative features, including a skylight that runs the entire length of the roof to maximize natural lighting. They also include single-hinged double doors that open nearly 180 degrees and lock closed, a slip-resistant polyethylene floor, and low-maintenance, steel-reinforced construction.

84 square ft. (627.2 cubic ft.) - The Lifetime 7 ft. x 12 ft. Storage Shed features: (1) full-length skylight, (2) shatter-proof polycarbonate windows, (2) screened vents, (1) 30 in. x 10 in. shelf, (2) corner shelves. Floor and installation hardware included.

Features:

  • Attractive Appearance and Design
  • Customisable Shelving and Storage System
  • Dual-Wall High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Construction
  • Heavy-Duty Steel Trusses Provide Additional Roof Strength
  • High-Pitched Roof Allows for Quick Drainage of Rain and Snow
  • Lockable Steel-Reinforced Doors for Added Security
  • Low Maintenance Design
  • Max Wind Resistance 65 mph (104.6 kph) (15 PSF)
  • Slip-Resistant High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Floor Protects Against Oil, Solvents, and Stains
  • Sturdy Steel-Reinforced Construction
  • UV Protected to Prevent Weather Damage
  • Assembly: Secure-Fastened Assembly with High-Grade Metal Screws
  • Rough cut panels
  • Comes in 2 boxes
  • Cubic Feet: 627.2 ft. cu
  • Door Handle: High-Impact Handles with Metal Latch
  • Door Hinges: Full-Length Galvanized Steel Hinge Pins
  • Door Locking: Exterior Padlock Loop with Two (2) Deadbolts on Interior of Left Door
  • Door Structure: Steel-Reinforced Polyethylene
  • Eave Depth: 5.08 cm
  • Floor Structure: Slip-Resistant Dual-Wall Polyethylene
  • Footprint: 206.5 cm x 353.8 cm
  • Interior Headroom: 197.6 cm)
  • Materials of Construction: Powder-Coated Steel and High-Density Polyethylene
  • Max Roof Load: 40 psf
  • Nominal Dimensions: 2.1 m x 3.7 m
  • Roof Pitch: 5:12
  • Roof Structure: Dual-Wall Polyethylene Panels
  • Roof Support Trusses: Four (4) Steel A-Frame Trusses
  • Screened Vents: Two (2) Screened Vents
  • Shelves: Two (2) Corner Shelves – 9 ½ in. radius + One (1) 30 in. W x 10 in. D Shelf
  • Square Feet: 7.8 m² (84 ft. sq)
  • Wall Structure: Steel-Reinforced Dual-Wall Polyethylene Panels
  • Windows: Two (2) H 31.5 x W 58 cm Polycarbonate Windows – Open Half-Way

N.B. Please note a cement foundation is required.

Please check full contents, footprint and measurements before installation. If you are enlisting the help of a third party to install this product, please ensure that all contents have been received in full and undamaged prior to arranging and paying for installation to take place. Accessories are not included.


Premium Installation Service:


Choose our Premium Installation Service with your chosen shed and enjoy the comfort of knowing that installation is taken care of by skilled and trained installers.

The installation office will contact you to guide you smoothly through the process and ensure you are happy with your purchase.

Prior to booking your install date (within 10 working days of delivery) the installers will telephone you to check the following:

1. That you have a suitable base for your shed. It needs to be firm, flat & level. We recommend concrete, slabs or a timber frame. Please note that your shed cannot be placed directly onto a base of grass, earth, sand etc as natural movement will effect the stability of the building.

2. That there is enough space to build your chosen shed and that access to the build area is clear of obstruction. A minimum of 24” (61cm) space is needed around the shed for the installers to work in.

3. That the contents have been checked in full and free from damage.

4. Please note that the installation company is unable to carry the shed through your home so if there is not adequate access, provision for this must be made. Please note that the installation service does not include the removal of packaging, but will leave it tidily for the member to dispose of.

  • 3 kW Balboa heater
  • Three air valves to adjust the massage strength
  • Quad insulation to ensure energy efficiency; high density polyurethane foam sprayed on the tub shell, silver backed foam inside the side panels and also inside the sealed on ABS tub base, provide the best insulation
  • Bluetooth sound system
  • Cloudy white shell colour with grey side panels
  • Requires 230V/32Amp RCD protected power supply (not included)
  • Includes cover, cover lifter, step, chemical starter pack, spare filter and installation.

Please also note standard delivery does not include crane hire or the closing of any roads. If you
have any queries of what is included in the standard delivery please call Blue Whale Spas customer
helpline: 0115 954 8888

N.B. The hot tub is not fitted with a cable or plug. Your electrician will need to leave a tail of 3 core 6mm armoured cable, connected to an isolator switch long enough to go from the isolator switch, around the tub to where you require the control panel to be. The installation team will not fit a cable into an isolator switch or consumer unit under any circumstances, please do not ask them to do this.

examples.description:
The Sharp LC-70UI9362K Smart UHD provides a wide range of connection possibilities. Three HDMI 2.0 ports are able to receive 2160p@60Hz signal, a USB 3.0 port is perfect for connecting a fast hard disc drive (in addition to two USB 2.0 ports).

Ultra HD resolution
Four times the resolution of Full HD, clarity and expanded colour ranges ensure the best entertainment ever. Built-in advanced picture up-scaler technology improves every type of content to 4K resolution.

HDR – High Dynamic Range
HDR is expanding the contrast ratio and colour palette to offer a more realistic and natural image.

Aquos Net+
After connecting your Smart TV to you home network, you can enjoy movies and TV shows through the Netflix app or watch the latest internet videos on YouTube.

Wireless TV connection
Wirelessly connect your PC or Android device to your TV and immediately send media files to the big screen. It’s a great way to enjoy photos and videos together with friends and family.

Active Motion 800
Conventional liquid crystal displays (LCD) reproduce blurry movements. Active Motion effectively sharpens moving pictures by creating additional frames with its powerful GPU and using high-speed LCD panels.

*Additional 3 year warranty is redeemed and claimed from Samsung and not Costco. The 5 Year Warranty must be registered within 21 to 90 days from the invoice date to validate any claim(s).

To activate promotional  5 Year Warranty and for further terms and conditions, visit the Samsung registration site at www.samsung.com/uk/fiveyearwarranty  to register your products (may require creating a MySamsung account).

If you have any problems using the online registration site please contact the Samsung Customer Support team (Tel:  0330 726 7864).

The Samsung RS50N3913BC American Style Fridge is a great addition to your kitchen. With the handy window on the door, you can have quick access to your favourite items without opening the main door. This also results in less cold air escaping and so saving energy too. 

Get Ice on Tap
Help yourself to chilled filtered water or a jug of ice without having to open the fridge.

Smarter Use of Energy
The Digital Inverter Compressor cleverly alters the fridge's power and running speed to how much cooling is needed. So the temperature is constantly perfect, making it more efficient, as well as less noisy and longer-lasting.

Make Freeze a Breeze
No more worrying about your frozen favourites defrosting on the way home from the shops. Power Freeze rapidly lowers the temperature of the freezer once you've stocked up, quickly freezing everyone's must-have ice cream.

Alarmingly Good
Never worry about leaving the fridge door open again. An alarm is triggered when the door is left open for too long. So your food will stay as chilled as it should be, plus you'll save energy.
 
Power Down
How good would it be if your fridge didn't use so much energy whenever you're away? Simply switch to Vacation Mode. It powers down the fresh food section, so it uses less energy, while the freezer still keeps all your food frozen.

Rack ‘em up
A wine rack doesn't have to take over your fridge. This chrome one is not only an elegant way to store your favourite bottles; it also makes more space on your shelves for the food to enjoy with it.

- Plumbed Water and Ice Dispenser

- Freestanding

- H 178.9 x W 91.2 x D 73.4 cm

- Installation and/or Recycle of old product available at check out

- Be sure your new fridge will fit - check product dimensions for access required before delivery

examples.description:
The Sonorous ST160 enables you to discreetly store all of your audio/video equipment right at the heart of your living space. The Sonorous 160cm cabinet is a stylish and functional addition to any home.

Hidden castors make it easier to move to your required position and reach connecting wires without scratching wooden floors. The Acoustic Fabric finished door allows full control of AV equipment inside the cabinet without having to open doors. It will also enable you to conceal speakers and soundbars inside the cabinet without affecting sound quality. Push to open door system with high quality hinges, multiple discreet cable management points and adjustable internal shelf heights to accommodate varying sizes of devices. This cabinet comes ready assembled for ease and consistent quality of construction.

Exceptional Quality and Finish

This furniture is designed and manufactured to ensure highest attention to detail and quality. The latest technological advancements are implemented to ensure the quality of your unit.

  • White: Gloss White Wood with Toughened White Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Black: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Walnut; Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Textured Walnut Veneer Across the Opening Flap
  • Black With Acoustic Fabric Doors: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Black Acoustic (Speaker) Fabric Across the Opening Flap

Contemporary yet Practical

AV equipment needs to “breathe” whilst in use, that’s why the ST160 cabinets are open at the rear to ensure sufficient ventilation and air flow, and easy access to all connecting wires. The Acoustic Fabric finish on the opening flap ensures even the most sophisticated of AV set up’s will be cooled sufficiently for optimal performance. In order to ensure that your cabinet looks its best at all times, the glass shelves come with a protective coating, which reduces stains and fingerprints.

Features:

  • Maximum screen size: 70” screen
  • Maximum Top Shelf Load: 50 kg
  • Maximum Stand Load: 70 kg
examples.name: Sonorous ST160 TV Cabinet for TVs up to 70" in 4 Colours
examples.summary:
- Suitable for TVs up to 70”

- Adjustable internal shelf heights

- Discreet cable management

description.title: The description schema
description.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
examples:
The Sonorous ST160 enables you to discreetly store all of your audio/video equipment right at the heart of your living space. The Sonorous 160cm cabinet is a stylish and functional addition to any home.

Hidden castors make it easier to move to your required position and reach connecting wires without scratching wooden floors. The Acoustic Fabric finished door allows full control of AV equipment inside the cabinet without having to open doors. It will also enable you to conceal speakers and soundbars inside the cabinet without affecting sound quality. Push to open door system with high quality hinges, multiple discreet cable management points and adjustable internal shelf heights to accommodate varying sizes of devices. This cabinet comes ready assembled for ease and consistent quality of construction.

Exceptional Quality and Finish

This furniture is designed and manufactured to ensure highest attention to detail and quality. The latest technological advancements are implemented to ensure the quality of your unit.

  • White: Gloss White Wood with Toughened White Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Black: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Across the Opening Flap
  • Walnut; Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Textured Walnut Veneer Across the Opening Flap
  • Black With Acoustic Fabric Doors: Gloss Black Wood with Toughened Black Glass On Top And Black Acoustic (Speaker) Fabric Across the Opening Flap

Contemporary yet Practical

AV equipment needs to “breathe” whilst in use, that’s why the ST160 cabinets are open at the rear to ensure sufficient ventilation and air flow, and easy access to all connecting wires. The Acoustic Fabric finish on the opening flap ensures even the most sophisticated of AV set up’s will be cooled sufficiently for optimal performance. In order to ensure that your cabinet looks its best at all times, the glass shelves come with a protective coating, which reduces stains and fingerprints.

Features:

  • Maximum screen size: 70” screen
  • Maximum Top Shelf Load: 50 kg
  • Maximum Stand Load: 70 kg

examples.description:
The Dimplex Leckford Optiflame 2kW enamel effect electric stove in matt black is a great maintenance-free alternative to a solid fuel stove and offers heat at the flick of a button. Using Optiflame technology to provide a realistic flame effect, the Leckford offers a choice of heat settings and flame only options so that it can be enjoyed with or without heat. Supplied with both coals and logs for you to create different looks.

Optiflame is the world’s most popular electric flame effect, and can be found in a wide selection of Dimplex fires. It is a unique, patented means of generating realistic simulated flames from an electric source and creates the illusion of flames emanating from the centre of an enhanced depth fuel bed to provide a realistic glow that can be enjoyed throughout the whole year.

Features:

  • LED flame effect powered by 10W
  • Fan heater
  • Choice of 2 heat settings
  • Variable thermostat
  • Remote control
  • Flame effect can be used independently of heat
  • BEAB approval
  • Opening doors
  • Fitted plug
  • Model: LEC20
  • Cord Length: 1.5m
  • Heat Output: 2kW
  • Assembly Required: No, delivered fully assembled
examples.name: Dimplex Leckford Optiflame Electric Stove in Matt Black, 2kW
